item.title: People doing crack and meth in stairwell, 23rd July
item.description:
We're worried that there might be someone in the estate who is dealing drugs because there has been an influx of people shooting up in the stairwell. its very unsafe to have these people who dont live here roaming high.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Regan Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Always rubbish on this busy passthrough, 23rd July
item.description:
I see this has been reported many times already, why hasn't anything been done? The bins are always overflowing (nearly every day) for the restaurant next door.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lamb Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mouse and cockroaches along the council terrace / stairwell, 23rd July
item.description:
Due to unhygienic issues in this council estate, including human faeces and pet faeces, children leaving crumbs and candy, and piling garbage bags without properly disposing of them (I'm sure you can ask the cleaner that comes by).
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Regan Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Position of recycling bins, 23rd July
item.description:
Despite previous requests, the bins continue to be positioned so that residents cannot get round to the back of them to put more recycling in. Why is this being done please? Please email me Cllr Alison Stammers. Thanks Also flap on a paper bin is broken and needs fixing please. Can I also have an update on when signage regarding no commercial waste here will be added? Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Adelaide Road, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The bin next to Riverside School on Main Road has disappeared., 23rd July
item.description:
The bin next to Riverside School on Main Road has disappeared. This has led to more rubbish in the area. Could it be replaced urgently especially with the School holidays starting this week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Main Black Gate to FLats Broken, 23rd July
item.description:
The main gate to the housing estate, which includes 69-79 Moundfield Road, is broken. As a result, non-residents have been gathering in the communal garden and engaging in anti-social behaviour.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Moundfield Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are 2 sets of Fly Tipping here, 23rd July
item.description:
About 5 days ago saw fist example and then another the next day. There are not 2 sets of flytipped rubbish including some furniture and wood planks alongside general rubbish. Dangerous for Pedestrians and Dogs as popular part of riverside walk in Foots Cray meadows
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Water Lane, North Cray, London
